text.0: we all have various thoughts and plans and diverse are the ways of men.
text.1: the brahman seeks the worshipper wright seeks the cracked and leech the maimed flow indu flow for indras sake.
text.2: the smith with ripe and seasoned plants with feathers of the birds of air.
text.3: with stones and with enkindled flames seeks him who hath a store of gold flow indu flow for indras sake.
text.4: a bard am i my dads a leech mammy lays corn upon the stones.
text.5: striving for wealth with varied plans we follow our desires like kine flow indu flow for indras sake.
text.6: the horse would draw an easy car gay hosts attract the laugh and jest.
text.7: the male desires his mates approach the frog is eager for the flood flow indu flow for indras sake.
